column1: Illustration size (256, 128, 1) by MRI of the head of a man of 37 years old with weighting in T2, with axial section. We carefully examine slice n°148 starting from the base of the skull. The section reveals the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3803.4668 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3991.9922 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 403.4180 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 1.3184 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 119.9707 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3639.9902 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4109.3262 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 419.2383 mm³ and the right caudate nucleus of volume 167.4316 mm³.

Weighted MRI size (256, 128, 1) in T2, exposing the skull of a person a man of 37 years old, of axial section n°148 beginning from the base of the skull.
